Text.Page: My master was an expert strategist. He always said, "A good soldier defeats her enemies, but a smart soldier defeats her enemies and takes their stuff."<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Indeed."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Listen up, <PCNAME>. The {@LinkCreature:15#11#cruel jockeys}, and {@LinkCreature:15#12#mutant dwarf fodder} and {@LinkCreature:15#13#scrappers} to the north wear the most interesting pendants. Such unique tokens of the federation's victory over evil will be invaluable one day. You see where I'm going with this?
Oh <PCNAME>, it's such a relief to meet a soldier with an entreprenurial spirit. Thank you.

, history is written not only in words, but in symbols. Those pendants are the symbols of my—our—future wealth.

Go get them.
